item.title: Bentoism üç±
item.description: What is Bentoism? see for yourself! A multi-dimensional way of framing what you want x-axis is time: from now -> the future y-axis interest: from self interest -> collective interest A tool for making decisions aligned with our values and goals.

item.title: Birth of this Microblog
item.description: Dunno what I’m doing but this is cool :) and makes me very happy! Took me way too long to realize the reason this wasn’t working was because I don’t know how to read instructions lol.

item.title: Serendipity, file management, health
item.description: Serendipity and math $Luck = f(A, E) = f(D, S, E)$ Luck is a function of $A$ - Surface Area.

item.title: Statistics & personal projects
item.description: Statistics Fun. It’s everywhere. [[Images/Beautiful visualizations.png |Beautiful visualizations]] spark joy. ![[Images/Beautiful visualizations.png]] Personal Projects A [[Diary/07-2023/Birth of this Microblog#Recent Observation|recent observation]] of the kinds of personal projects I pursue has prompted me to ask myself this question:

item.title: What does success mean to you?
item.description: To my future self, I hope you’re healthy, both physically and mentally. Seriously, health is the number one priority. Lift weights and do some form of cardio, no matter how old you may be.

item.title: What the heck is CRISPR?
item.description: Foreword So, I can learn about molecular biology on my own outside the lab (duh lol). I say I study Molecular and Cell Biology (MCB) and Public Health at UC Berkeley, so it’s time to act like it.
